rows.label: qst200316_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Ugaaaaaaaaah!!

rows.label: qst200316_msg0002
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]...Why do you still fight?

rows.label: qst200316_msg0003
rows.name: No, wait... Are you their mother?

rows.label: qst200316_msg0004
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Guuuuuuuuuh!

rows.label: qst200316_msg0005
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]I see... You are protecting them...

rows.label: qst200316_msg0006
rows.name: Their mother? So they're a family?!

rows.label: qst200316_msg0007
rows.name:
I see... These Gogols lived
in Zalmor's Crevice.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0008
rows.name:
And they caused the rockfall
to protect their home...

rows.label: qst200316_msg0009
rows.name:
The rampage in Teos Aure
must have been to keep
people away from their home.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0010
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst200316_msg0012
rows.name:
When Luxuria ended its isolation,
many salt caves were dug for the
sake of exporting resources.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0013
rows.name:
But because of that, wild
animals are starting to be
driven from their homes.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0014
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Guuuuh...!

rows.label: qst200316_msg0015
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]The fight is over. ...I am sorry.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0016
rows.name: Guh?

rows.label: qst200316_msg0017
rows.name: You... Do not attack humans anymore.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0018
rows.name: I will talk to the humans.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0019
rows.name:
I will persuade them not
to destroy your home.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0020
rows.name: So... live here quietly.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0022
rows.name: Does it understand his words, mo?

rows.label: qst200316_msg0023
rows.name:
Who knows? But I think
the feeling got across.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0024
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Ugaa!

rows.label: qst200316_msg0025
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]It seems you've persuaded it, Jikarao.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0026
rows.name: They... won't attack people anymore.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0027
rows.name: That's right. It's safe now.

rows.label: qst200316_msg0028
rows.name:
Now, let's return to Teos Aure
and report to Evart-san.
